resources.string: Pregnancy Tools N Tips

Gestational age, or the age of the baby, is calculated from the first day of the motherâ€™s last menstrual period. Since the exact date of conception is almost never known, the first day of the last menstrual period is used to measure how old the baby is. Please pick the first day of your last menstrual period using the Pick Date button below:
Pick Date
Dismiss on pause (eg: orientation change)
No Data
Next
Settings
Quiz Result

This quiz is about understanding yourself and all the experiences that make up pregnancy. This quiz is designed to help you get a sense of how you are experiencing your pregnancy: how you feel about yourself, your journey and the promise of parenthood.An overall score will be calculated at the end to help you navigate the pregnancy. Take the quiz as often as you like, especially as you grow and learn about yourself during these nine months. Your score may change along the way--and thats because you will too.
Your interest in sex may have gone up since you got pregnant. This is due to the harmones.
Your interest in sex is about what it was before you got pregnant. Enjoy!

You are showing less in interest in sex than you may used to be.If you are feeling a much lower interest in sex even during the second trimester, you might want to chaeckout some tips for adding sensuality into your life.
Congrats! Even though you pregnant, you have sharp focus.
You may feel less indecisive than before, and you may have trouble remembering things. This is quite normal during pregnancy.
You seem to be having a lot trouble thinking since you got pregnant. If you feel that you have slipped quite a bit, then you need to review aspects of your lifestyle
You are eating well, If you feel some nausea, its quite normal.
Nausea is affecting your eating.Its important to listen to your body. You can make some simple diet changes to feel better.

You are experiencing moderate nausea, which is affecting the way you eat. You may be having some cravings. It may be time to work on you diet to give your baby the nutrients needed for healthy brain and body development.
Nausea is having a great affect on what you eat. If you are in the first trimester remember its that when nausea is worst. You will need to make best choices about foods.
You dont seem to be much worried about your body. Make sure though that you are still in shape.
You have a small amount of concern about your body image. Make sure that you eat balanced meals and nutritious foods. Remember exercise is good for you and your baby.
You have quite a bit concern about your body. Its really crucial that you exercise and eat balanced, nutritious meals during pregnancy.
Congratulations! You have acheived some real balance in your pregnant life. There is a lot ahead of you but you are quite centered so far
Like most pregnant women, there are days when you have it together and days when things seem beyond your grasp.

Between your nausea, your inablity to think straight, and your negative feelings about your body, you are probably looking at pregnancy more like a never ending traffic jam than an olympic gymnastic event. All the same, you are in the middle of one of the life\'s peak experiences. You should take a look at the tips section of the app!
